Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Valvular Heart Disorder/Valvular Stenosis/Aortic Stenosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Heart Valve Diseases/Aortic Valve Stenosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Ventricular Outflow Obstruction/Aortic Valve Stenosis
Record.Description: A pathological constriction that can occur above (supravalvular stenosis), below (subvalvular stenosis), or at the AORTIC VALVE. It is characterized by restricted outflow from the LEFT VENTRICLE into the AORTA.
Narrowing of the orifice of the aortic valve or of the supravalvular or subvalvular regions.
